title: Your guide to the weirdest winter virus season we’ve ever had
description: This winter was already shaping up to be one of the strangest cold and flu seasons in recent memory.  With Robert F. Kennedy at the helm of the US Department of Health and Human Services, the federal government has been casting doubt on the value of vaccines …
content:
Cold viruses, the flu, Covid-19, and RSV could be brutal this year. But you can protect yourself. | A. Martin/Getty Images
